title: Ticket #757: Improve Condor cron documentation
description:
(Based on a report by Alain Roy.)

I found the documentation really confusing to figure out how to use Condor cron. If someone wants to improve it, I'm happy to sit down and go over it in person.
remarks: I actually believe that this is no longer true. Nick spent some effort in revising this part and from what I can tell it seems reasonable. I'll be glad to help out if anybody has a different opinion. But for now: closed.
creator: adesmet
